Protein Names: Sulfite reductase, dissimilatory-type subunit beta (EC 1.8.99.5) (Desulfoviridin subunit beta) (Dissimilatory sulfite reductase subunit beta) (dSiR beta) (Hydrogensulfite reductase subunit beta)
